peaceOfMind.title: Peace of Mind, Powered by Automation
peaceOfMind.description: No more chasing employees or endless follow-ups. Our AI-driven platform ensures tasks get done—on time, every time—without manual reminders.

noManualWork.title: Say Goodbye to Manual Oversight
noManualWork.description: Our smart agents connect with your team directly via Slack and email, handling training, data collection, and policy sign-offs—so you don't have to.

realTime.title: Stay Ahead with Real-Time Visibility
realTime.description: Instantly see what's done, what's pending, and where the risks are. With continuous insights, you're always a step ahead of non-compliance.

quickLaunch.title: Launch in Minutes, Not Months
quickLaunch.description: No complex onboarding. No expensive consultants. Just a fast, seamless rollout that gets your team up and running—today.

allInOne.title: Everything You Need. One Platform.
allInOne.description: Manage SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, and more—all in one place. Fully automated. Fully integrated. Fully under control.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about our mission to simplify compliance with AI-powered solutions.
about.heading: Quantifier: The Autonomous Compliance Officer for the AI Era
about.subtitle: Transforming how organizations manage compliance with an always-on, AI-native platform
about.intro1: Quantifier is transforming how organizations manage compliance — with an always-on, AI-native platform that continuously monitors, enforces, and drives adherence to regulations like SOC, ISO, and GDPR. Acting as your virtual compliance officer, Quantifier automates data collection, task management, and oversight, ensuring continuous audit readiness and confidence in an ever-evolving regulatory landscape.
about.intro2: Over the past three years, we've supported more than 250 organizations across Europe, the US, and Latin America — from global industry leaders in manufacturing, pharma, and professional services to fast-growing startups. Our network includes 50+ partners, including major banks, consulting firms, and NGOs.
about.intro3: We're proud to be recognized by top media outlets and to have received multiple awards for innovation and impact.
about.intro4: Our team includes some of the best engineers, lawyers, and advisors — many holding or pursuing PhDs — united by a mission to build the AI infrastructure powering the future of global compliance.

highlights.title: Key Highlights
highlights.globalReachDesc: Operating in Europe, US, and Latin America
highlights.partnersDesc: Including banks, consulting firms, and NGOs

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Quantifier, we're on a mission to build the AI infrastructure that powers the future of global compliance. We believe that with the right technology, organizations can transform compliance from a burden into a competitive advantage.
mission.aiNativeDesc: Built from the ground up with AI at its core, not as an afterthought
mission.expertiseDesc: Engineers, lawyers, and domain experts working in unison
mission.innovationDesc: Constantly evolving our solutions for the changing regulatory landscape
mission.globalDesc: Solutions designed for international compliance requirements

features.title: Built-in Intelligence, Embedded Compliance
features.description: Explore the features behind Quantifier's Autonomous Compliance Engine

aiOfficer.title: AI Agent Officer
aiOfficer.subtitle: Quantifier's AI Agent Officer acts as your always-on compliance assistant — trained to understand complex frameworks, coordinate tasks, assign responsibilities, and drive results in real time.

features.feature1: Onboards employees into the right controls and frameworks
features.feature2: Guides teams step-by-step through SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, CSRD, and more
features.feature3: Sends intelligent nudges, escalations, and follow-ups
features.feature4: Interprets framework requirements and translates them into plain language and actionable tasks
features.feature5: Handles Q&A and training workflows across departments

aiOfficer.whyMattersText: AI agents eliminate the bottlenecks of human coordination and static instructions. You get consistency, speed, and clarity — at scale.

mockup.title: AI Compliance Assistant
mockup.greeting: Good morning! I've detected 3 new control tasks for ISO 27001 that need your attention.
mockup.userMessage: Please prioritize these for me by deadline.
mockup.response: I've sorted your tasks by urgency. Your top priority is updating the access control policy which is due in 3 days.

analytics.title: AI Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Powerful Dashboards. Actionable Insights. Full Control.
analytics.description: Forget stale reports. Quantifier gives you real-time visibility across all your compliance domains — with powerful dashboards and full Power BI integrations.

features.feature1: Executive dashboards tailored to CFOs, CISOs, and compliance leads
features.feature2: Live KPI monitoring by framework, team, entity, or risk domain
features.feature3: Drill-down capability for granular evidence and documentation tracking
features.feature4: AI-generated risk summaries and insight recommendations
features.feature5: Custom reporting with export to XLSX, PDF, or direct BI tools

analytics.whyMattersText: You're not just tracking compliance — you're managing risk, allocating resources, and reporting to the board with confidence.

taskHub.title: Task & Data Hub
taskHub.subtitle: Centralize Every Request, Task, Document, and Interaction
taskHub.description: The Task & Data Hub brings together all actions across your compliance program — into one clean, searchable, permissioned workspace.

features.feature1: Trigger evidence or input requests to specific individuals or teams
features.feature2: Track and manage documentation submissions by control or framework
features.feature3: Assign and reassign ownership, due dates, and priority levels
features.feature5: See a real-time audit trail of what's done, what's delayed, and what's missing

taskHub.whyMattersText: No more chasing people in Slack or through email. Everything is trackable, time-stamped, and mapped to your controls.

riskAssessment.title: AI Risk Assessment
riskAssessment.subtitle: Continuous Risk Visibility and Remediation Guidance
riskAssessment.description: Quantifier's agents proactively monitor your organization's compliance risk posture — surfacing weaknesses, suggesting remediations, and tracking incidents automatically.

features.feature2: Continuous control monitoring and deviation alerts
features.feature4: Smart recommendations for mitigations or corrective action
features.feature5: Integrated risk registers per entity, team, or framework

riskAssessment.whyMattersText: You don't need a dedicated team to monitor every policy or control. The platform watches, assesses, and responds — before risk turns into failure.

mockup.criticalDesc: Unusual admin privileges granted outside approval process
mockup.warningDesc: Data retention policy requires review (last updated 367 days ago)

auditManagement.title: Internal & External Audit Management
auditManagement.subtitle: End-to-End Automation of the Audit Lifecycle
auditManagement.description: From audit prep to remediation, Quantifier streamlines the full process — reducing manual work and increasing audit confidence.

features.feature2: Role-based evidence collection from internal teams
features.feature3: Dedicated portal for external auditors with controlled access
features.feature4: Automated mapping of documents to control points
features.feature5: Remediation plans with AI-generated action items and timelines

apiIntegration.title: Seamless API Integration
apiIntegration.subtitle: Automate Data Collection at the Source
apiIntegration.description: Quantifier connects directly to your systems—HRIS, ERP, cloud storage, financial tools, and more—through secure APIs to collect evidence, pull logs, and verify data automatically.
apiIntegration.noManual: No more manual uploads. No more copy-paste.

features.feature1: Real-time data syncing from internal systems
features.feature2: Auto-filled evidence trails across multiple frameworks
features.feature3: Instant access to relevant documents, usage logs, and activity records
features.feature4: Fewer tasks for contributors, with higher confidence in data accuracy

valueChainSection.title: Value Chain Management
valueChainSection.subtitle: Bring Suppliers and Partners into Your Compliance Process
valueChainSection.description: Compliance doesn't stop at your organization's boundaries. Quantifier enables you to assess, manage, and collaborate with suppliers, vendors, and partners across your entire value chain.

features.feature1: Secure access portals for third parties to respond to compliance requests
features.feature2: Supplier-level risk scoring and automated due diligence
features.feature3: Monitoring tools for ESG, cybersecurity, and regulatory performance
features.feature4: Consolidated documentation for CBAM, Scope 3 emissions, GDPR contracts, and more

valueChainSection.aiOfficerTitle: What the AI Agent Officer does:

aiFeatures.feature1: Sends compliance requests directly to your suppliers
aiFeatures.feature2: Tracks progress and follows up automatically
aiFeatures.feature3: Evaluates submitted data for completeness and risk
aiFeatures.feature4: Flags gaps or inconsistencies before they affect your compliance posture

hero.title: Meet Your New AI Compliance Officer
hero.subtitle: A powerful AI that continuously monitors your compliance program, automates routine tasks, and provides intelligent recommendations.

howItWorks.title: How Our AI Compliance Officer Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Quantifier's AI Compliance Officer combines advanced language models, specialized compliance knowledge, and autonomous capabilities to transform how you manage compliance.

monitoring.title: Continuous Monitoring
monitoring.description: Our AI never sleeps, constantly analyzing your compliance status, identifying risks, and detecting potential gaps before they become issues.

expertise.title: Framework Expertise
expertise.description: Pre-trained on ISO 14001, GHG Protocol, ISO 14064, and dozens of other environmental standards and regulations with regular updates.

action.title: Autonomous Action
action.description: Beyond alerting, our AI can take action—assigning tasks, requesting information, scheduling reviews, and even drafting documentation.

features.feature1: Automated policy reviews and updates when standards change
features.feature2: AI-driven internal audit preparation and evidence collection
features.feature3: Continuous environmental objective tracking and reporting

features.feature1: Automated data collection across Scope 1, 2 and 3 emissions
features.feature2: Anomaly detection in emissions data with root cause analysis

features.feature1: Guided data collection and validation for product LCAs
features.feature2: Intelligent gap filling for missing environmental impact data
features.feature3: Automated impact hotspot identification and optimization

features.feature1: Science-based target setting with automated progress tracking
features.feature2: AI-recommended carbon reduction initiatives with ROI analysis
features.feature3: Predictive modeling of future emissions based on business growth
